coffees.review: An omni roast coffee from El Salvador, this natural processed Bourbon variety from Maurico Salvatierra offers a rich and punchy espresso.

This Colombian coffee from Hacienda La Pradera in Huila offers a rich blend of caramel, berry, and cocoa flavors. It's a natural processed Caturra variety, known for its sweet and fruity profile. A delightful choice for coffee enthusiasts!
